item.title: Eastern Accents is closing for good on March 16, 2013
item.description: ANN ARBOR (Monday, February 18, 2013) From a news release from Carol Sun of Eastern Accents.  Eastern Accents will be closing its doors for good at 7:00 p.m. on Saturday, March 16, 2013 (end of the day).  A long-simmering dispute with our landlord has finally come to a head, and weâ€™ve decided that it is time for change. Carol writes: Feel free to help spread the word.  We want to get the word out--especially to anyone who might have gift card values to redeem.
